pages.text: 81|1|Suryaka yetiya nisprabha karaa ha’ba
81|2|arau naksatraraaji yetiya khahi paraiba
81|3|parbatasamuhaka yetiya sancalita karaa ha’ba
81|4|arau yetiya purna gabhini utaboraka ayatne erai diya ha’ba
81|5|arau yetiya banaraiya pasuboraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
81|6|arau yetiya sagarasamuhaka agni'uttala karaa ha’ba
81|7|arau yetiya atmasamuhaka (samagotraiyasakalara lagata) milita karaa ha’ba
81|8|arau yetiya jiranta samadhistha kan'yasisuka sodha ha’ba
81|9|ki aparaadhata ta'ika hatya karaa haichila
81|10|arau yetiya amalanamasamuha unmocita karaa ha’ba
81|11|arau yetiya akasara ararana apasaraita karaa ha’ba
81|12|arau yetiya jahannamaka bhisanabharae prajjbalita karaa ha’ba
81|13|arau jannataka yetiya nikatabarti karaa ha’ba
81|14|tetiya pratyeka byaktiye'i janiba si ki upasthita karaiche.
81|15|Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho arartanasila naksatraborara
81|16|yibora gatisila, adrsya
81|17|arau raatira sapata yetiya i bidaya laya
81|18|arau prabhatara sapata yetiya iyara abirbhara haya
81|19|niscaya e'i kora'ana sanmanita raachule lai aha bani.
81|20|Yijana saktisali, arasbara malikara ocarata maryadasampanna
81|21|man'yabara, tata te'om bisbasta.
81|22|Arau tomalokara sangi unmada nahaya
81|23|arau te'om te'omka spasta digantata dekhiche
81|24|Arau te'om gayebi bisaya samparke krpanali'o nakarae.
81|25|Arau eya kono abhisapta cayatanarao bakya nahaya.
81|26|Eteke tomaloke konaphale gati karaicha
81|27|e'ito kerala samagra jagatabasira babe upadesa bani
81|28|tara babe, tomalokara majara yiye sarala pathata caliba bicarae.
81|29|Tomaloke iccha karaiba noraaraa, yetiya laike bisbajagatara pratipalaka allahe iccha nakarae.
